channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
i know this is sad but..
how can i make it so that i can put something on megaupload so everyone can just click on the link i provide and just click on the download button to start downloading it?

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Goto http://www.megaupload.com/
then select the file you’d like to upload by clicking the browse button.
Enter a description and click Send, I believe that is what the button says, and then you wait for it to upload.
It should then give you link to the download.

EDIT:

© CopyRight ©:

When it says REcipients Email, Type yours but for the sender email type something random. Then copy the link that was sent to your email and there you go.

It does tell you the download link you know, without using email…

Read full topic

item.description:
@t_cups wrote:

ok thank you very much.

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @_CopyRight CopyRight
item.description:
@_CopyRight wrote:

Go to megaupload.com

Then you have to browse a file, Then you Click start Send,

When it says REcipients Email, Type yours but for the sender email type something random. Then copy the link that was sent to your email and there you go.
